title: Ionic compound solubility in water is favored by

content.description: High solubility of an ionic solid in water is favored by which of the following conditions?
content.question: The existence of strong ionic attractions in the crystal lattice The formation of strong ion-dipole attractions An increase in entropy upon dissolving

skill.text: 6.E: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using connections between particulate and macroscopic scales or levels.
